text: Basildon ( ) is a large town in Essex, England. It had a recorded population of 115,955 at the 2021 census. In 1931, the town had a population of 1,159. It was then expanded when it became a new town in the late 1940s. It lies east of Central London, south of the city of Chelmsford and west of the city of Southend-on-Sea. == References == ==Other websites== * Basildon Council * Basildon Heritage * Basildon Borough History – Basildon * Basildon History Online * Gateway 97.8 – Community Radio station * Basildon Radio – Basildon local Internet Radio station * Category:Towns in Essex
title: Basildon
